about_the_game:
When you enter Kongming’s fiendish maze you enter a world of mountains and mists, valleys and acid pools, walls you can’t climb with gates that may lead somewhere….but not where you think. You have 15 minutes to escape. Pick up a weapon to kill your enemies. Find the health crate to restore your health. Use the mini map to guide you. Follow the clues to freedom. Your powers of memory and observation will be tested to the limit. Mastering the secrets of the fiendish maze will show you just how powerful your mind really is. It’s just you against Kongming.
Good luck!
Kongming is the brilliant master strategist in the classic Chinese novel The Three Kingdoms. Dismissed as a village bumpkin, his wisdom and cunning make him superior to all the warlords in China.
This is a one player game using standard controls on a laptop or PC: W, A, S, D or the arrow keys to move. Space bar to jump. Left click on mouse to fight. Right click to move the camera. For a controller it’s left stick to move the player. Right stick to move the camera. A to jump. X to fight.
